item.title: Detect when node_modules are out of sync
item.description: I’m pretty sure this already happened to you as well. You pull down the latest main branch or jump to some feature branch and you start getting weird errors. Until only later you recognize you forgot to execute an npm install. Let’s look into how we can avoid that.

item.title: Node, Grunt, Bower and Yeoman - A Modern web dev's Toolkit
item.description: This article aims at introducing you to some of the currently most popular tools when developing modern web applications with JavaScript. These are totally not new at all and have been around for a couple of years now.

item.title: Integrating Node.js with a C# dll
item.description: Recently I had to integrate a Node.js based server application with a C# DLL. Our software (a web-app) offers the possibility to execute payments over a POS terminal.

item.title: Automate your UI testing with Nightwatch
item.description: Although I feel like I'm repeating myself, automate **everything**. We're here to automate the processes and work of our clients. Why don't we do the same for our own stuff as well?
